scripts.clean: rimraf build/api-doc && rimraf build/angular && rimraf build/docs && rimraf build/spring-swagger && rimraf build/spring-openapi
scripts.build: npm run clean && run-p build:angular build:spring build:docs
scripts.build:prepare:win32: if not exist build\api-doc md build\api-doc && if not exist build\angular md build\angular
scripts.build:angular: npm run build:prepare && run-p build:angular:* && npm run compile:angular:*
scripts.build:angular:example: java -jar tools/openapi-generator-cli-6.0.1.jar generate -i openapi/example.openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o build/angular/example -c openapi/example.angular.config.json
